ContactForm.title: Let's Talk About Your Search
ContactForm.subtitle: Have questions about a property? Want to audit an apartment before reserving? We are here to protect your purchase.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: Have questions? We are here to help you invest correctly.
contact.get_in_touch_desc: We are always ready to help you. Whether you have a specific property in mind or just starting your search.
contact.success_message: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you shortly.

RenovationCalculator.title: Renovation Estimator 2026
RenovationCalculator.subtitle: Market-based estimation for Valencia & Costa Blanca

ticket.disclaimer: Market estimation 2026. Does not constitute a binding offer. VAT not included.

home.seo_title: TESELA PROJECTS | Safe Real Estate Investment
home.seo_desc: Specific audits for investors in the Valencian Community. We verify debts, licenses, and urban legality.
home.problem_title: Why are traditional real estate portals insufficient?
home.problem_desc: Portals like Idealista merely display ads. They do not verify legal status. We analyze, verify, and protect.
home.problem_1_desc: Apartments are often sold as 'Airbnb ready' even when the community explicitly bans tourist rentals.
home.problem_2_desc: Properties may have attached debts from old mortgages or spills that transfer to you upon purchase.
home.problem_3_desc: Sellers often list 40% above market value. We tell you the real price based on recent local sales.
home.how_title: How does the Property Audit work?
home.how_1_desc: Paste the URL from Idealista, Fotocasa, or any agency website. Investing 49€ now saves thousands later.
home.how_2_desc: Our architects and lawyers check the Land Registry, Cadastre, and Urban Planning files.
home.how_3_desc: In 24 hours, you get a PDF with a clear 'Traffic Light' verdict: Green (Safe), Yellow (Caution), or Red (Danger).
home.cta_final_desc: Join the investors who sleep peacefully knowing exactly what they are buying.
home.city_desc: We know every corner. From the Costa Blanca to Castellón. We identify areas with high potential and where the regulatory traps are.
home.ben_1_desc: We verify Nota Simple, urban infractions, and debts. Don't inherit someone else's problems.
home.ben_2_desc: Clear, flat-fee pricing (€49). We reveal hidden renovation costs or community fees before you buy.
home.ben_3_desc: Reports delivered in English, German, Dutch, or Swedish. Complex Spanish legalese explained simply.
home.hero_desc_premium: Your Local Partner for the entire journey. From finding the perfect property to managing the tenants. We handle everything.
home.value_prop_title: More than a Real Estate Agency. Your Local Partner.
home.value_prop_desc: Tailored services for international investors seeking profitability without headaches.
home.service_1_desc: We guide you from search to signature. We find your ideal home and handle all legal bureaucracy.
home.service_2_desc: Access our network of verified local contractors. We supervise the work so you only enjoy the result.
home.service_3_desc: Maximize your investment. We manage your property rentals when you are away with total security.
home.service_4_desc: Break the language barrier. Practical classes to integrate into the local culture from day one.

footer.brand_desc: Protecting your real estate investment in the Valencian Community. Risk detection and comprehensive management experts.

services_page.hero_desc: Don't guess. Know exactly what you are buying.

audit_page.hero_desc: Our 'Digital Scan' detects illegal renovations, attached debts, and fake licenses before you sign anything.

calculator_section.title: How much does it cost to renovate in Valencia?
calculator_section.desc: Get a realistic estimate in seconds. No surprises, safety buffers included. Plan your investment with updated 2026 market data.

city_page.guarantee_text: 100% Money-back guarantee if we don't find relevant data.
